overview: Devin is a Partner at Chicago Growth Partners and is focused on investment opportunities in the business and consumer services industries. Prior to joining CGP, Devin spent fifteen years working in the private equity industry with Baird Venture Partners, Great Hill Partners and William Blair Capital Partners where he started his private equity career. Prior to WBCP, Devin was an equity research analyst covering business services and financial technology companies. Select current and past directorships include: Vigo Remittance Corporation, Fellon-McCord & Associates, Arroweye Solutions, Inc., LatinVest LLC, TrueAdvantage, Inc., Encover, Inc. and Payroll Associates. Devin received his MBA from the Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth and he holds a BA from the State University of New York at Binghamton.
